languages.text: "У нас такого хватает, взять к примеру "памятки". {n}Энрих закатывает рукав, демонстрируя татуировку поверх старого ожога.{/n} "Когда выживаешь в особо безнадежной аварии, на шрам надо делать татуировку. Опытных инфернусов всегда видно по таким чернилам, это у нас что-то вроде медалей".

"We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."
languages.original_text: "У нас такого хватает, взять к примеру "памятки". {n}Энрих закатывает рукав, демонстрируя татуировку поверх старого ожога.{/n} "Когда выживаешь в особо безнадежной аварии, на шрам надо делать татуировку. Опытных инфернусов всегда видно по таким чернилам, это у нас что-то вроде медалей".

traits.locale_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo on top of an old burn.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced Infernus by their ink, it's like a badge of honour of sorts."

You can always tell an experienced Infernus by their ink, it's like a badge of honour of sorts."

You can always tell an experienced Infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

You can always tell an experienced Infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

languages.text: « On en a à foison, comme les souvenances, par exemple. » {n}Einrich roule l'une de ses manches, dévoilant une ancienne brûlure recouverte d'un tatouage.{/n} « Quand on survit à un accident particulièrement grave, on se fait faire un tatouage sur la cicatrice. Les Infernus les plus expérimentés sont couverts de tatouages. C'est un peu comme une preuve de valeur. »
languages.original_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

traits.locale_text: « On en a à foison, comme les souvenances, par exemple. » {n}Einrich roule l'une de ses manches, dévoilant une ancienne brûlure recouverte d'un tatouage.{/n} « Quand on survit à un accident particulièrement grave, on se fait faire un tatouage sur la cicatrice. Les Infernus les plus expérimentés sont couverts de tatouages. C'est un peu comme une preuve de valeur. »

languages.text: «De esas tenemos muchas, como los recordatorios». {n}Einrich se remanga, mostrando un tatuaje trazado sobre una antigua quemadura.{/n} «Cuando sobrevivimos a un accidente especialmente terrible, nos tatuamos la cicatriz. Mirando la piel de un infernus puedes saber cuánta experiencia tiene. Es como una medalla, en cierto modo».
languages.original_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

traits.locale_text: «De esas tenemos muchas, como los recordatorios». {n}Einrich se remanga, mostrando un tatuaje trazado sobre una antigua quemadura.{/n} «Cuando sobrevivimos a un accidente especialmente terrible, nos tatuamos la cicatriz. Mirando la piel de un infernus puedes saber cuánta experiencia tiene. Es como una medalla, en cierto modo».

languages.text: “我们有很多传统，这些传统就像在提醒我们一样。”{n}艾因里奇撸起袖子，露出了纹在烧伤皮肤上的纹身。{/n}“如果你能在绝境中存活下来，那就有权在烧伤的地方纹个纹身。通过大家的纹身，就能看得出来大家的火场经验怎么样。这就像是某种荣誉勋章一样。”
languages.original_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

traits.locale_text: “我们有很多传统，这些传统就像在提醒我们一样。”{n}艾因里奇撸起袖子，露出了纹在烧伤皮肤上的纹身。{/n}“如果你能在绝境中存活下来，那就有权在烧伤的地方纹个纹身。通过大家的纹身，就能看得出来大家的火场经验怎么样。这就像是某种荣誉勋章一样。”

languages.text: 「それは沢山持っている。」{n}アインリッヒは袖をまくり上げ、古い火傷の跡の上に刻まれたタトゥーを見せた。{/n}「絶望的な自己を生き抜くと、タトゥーを入れるんだ。インフェルヌスの経験の深さは刻まれたインクを見ればすぐに分かる。恐怖のバッジのようなものさ」
languages.original_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

traits.locale_text: 「それは沢山持っている。」{n}アインリッヒは袖をまくり上げ、古い火傷の跡の上に刻まれたタトゥーを見せた。{/n}「絶望的な自己を生き抜くと、タトゥーを入れるんだ。インフェルヌスの経験の深さは刻まれたインクを見ればすぐに分かる。恐怖のバッジのようなものさ」

languages.text: "Davon haben wir reichlich, und auch Erinnerungen daran." {n}Einrich rollt seinen Ärmel hoch und präsentiert eine Tätowierung über einer alten Brandwunde.{/n} "Wenn man einen besonders hoffnungslosen Unfall überlebt, bekommt man ein Tattoo über der Narbe. Man erkennt einen erfahrenen Infernus immer an seinen Tätowierungen. Das ist eine Art Ehrenmedaille."
languages.original_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."

traits.locale_text: "Davon haben wir reichlich, und auch Erinnerungen daran." {n}Einrich rollt seinen Ärmel hoch und präsentiert eine Tätowierung über einer alten Brandwunde.{/n} "Wenn man einen besonders hoffnungslosen Unfall überlebt, bekommt man ein Tattoo über der Narbe. Man erkennt einen erfahrenen Infernus immer an seinen Tätowierungen. Das ist eine Art Ehrenmedaille."

languages.text: "Bizde onlardan bol bol vardır. Anımsatıcılar gibi." {n}Einrich, kolunu sıyırıp eski bir yanık izinin üzerine işlenmiş dövmesini gösteriyor.{/n} "Aşırı umutsuz bir kazadan sağ çıktığınızda yara izinizin üzerine dövme yaparlar. Deneyimli bir itfacıyı üzerindeki mürekkepten tanıyabilirsiniz. Bir tür onur madalyası gibidir."
languages.original_text: "We have plenty of those, like the reminders." {n}Einrich rolls up his sleeve, revealing a tattoo inscribed over an old burn mark.{/n} "When you survive a particularly hopeless accident, you get a tattoo on your scar. You can always tell an experienced infernus by their ink. It's like a badge of honour of sorts."
